吐便當.definition: (slang) (of a character) to reappear in a story line after having been supposedly killed off; cf. 領盒飯|领盒饭[ling3 he2 fan4]

吐口.definition: to spit; fig. to spit out (a request, an agreement etc)

吐字.definition: diction; enunciation; (opera) to pronounce the words correctly

吐實.definition: to reveal the truth; to spill the beans

吐故納新.definition: lit. to breathe out stale air and breathe in fresh (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3]); fig. to get rid of the old and bring in the new

吐槽.definition: (slang) to roast; to ridicule; also pr. [tu3 cao2]

吐氣.definition: to exhale; to blow off steam; (phonetics) aspirated

吐瓦魯.definition: Tuvalu, island country in the SW Pacific (Tw)

吐穗.definition: to have the ears of grain come up

吐絮.definition: cotton boll splits open and reveals its white interior

吐絲.definition: (of spiders, caterpillars, silkworms etc) to extrude silk

吐絲自縛.definition: to spin a cocoon around oneself (idiom); enmeshed in a trap of one's own devising; hoist with his own petard

吐苦水.definition: to have bitter digestive fluids rising to the mouth; fig. to complain bitterly; to pour out one's sufferings

吐蕃.definition: Tubo or Tufan, old name for Tibet; the Tibetan Tubo dynasty 7th-11th century AD; also pr. [Tu3 fan1]

吐血.definition: to cough up blood; (coll.) (used figuratively to indicate an extreme degree of anger or frustration etc)

吐谷渾.definition: Tuyuhun, nomadic people related to the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑[Xian1 bei1]; a state in Qinghai in 4th-7th century AD

吐露.definition: to tell; to disclose; to reveal

吐魯番.definition: see 吐魯番市|吐鲁番市[Tu3lu3fan1 Shi4]

吐魯番市.definition: Turpan, prefecture-level city in Xinjiang Uighur Autonomous Region 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区[Xin1jiang1 Wei2wu2er3 Zi4zhi4qu1]
